I wrote a blog earlier about is it possible to like this music and not do drugs. I got a lot of blog messages saying how there is plenty people out there who go raving and listen to this music and don't touch drugs.
;I can understand this, how many people choose to not touch them which is a fabulous decision in my opinion! But i was more thinking along the lines of someone who HAS taken them before, know what its like, and to actually go back to a rave or be in an atmosphere with lots of pill heads and resist taking them!
;I think it is easier for someone who has never experienced class A drugs to say no, but is it possible to go into that atmosphere again and say no, when you've already taken them?
;Im sure its possible..but is it really believable? When you've already been high plenty of times in your life and know how good it can be..and you want to stop..can you really go back to those places and resist or should you avoid being around those people altogether?
